title: "John's Workouts"

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = T, warning = F, message = F, error = T)

# https://readxl.tidyverse.org/
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(DT)
```

---


# Routines


```{r, include=F}
workouts <- "./static/workouts.xlsx"
w1 <- read_excel(workouts, sheet=6)
w2 <- read_excel(workouts, sheet=7)
w3 <- read_excel(workouts, sheet=8)
```


## Push

```{r, eval=T}
datatable(w1, options=list(scrollX=T, dom='t'), escape=FALSE)
```


## Pull

```{r, eval=T}
datatable(w2, options=list(scrollX=T, dom='t'), escape=FALSE)
```

## Legs

```{r, eval=T}
datatable(w3, options=list(scrollX=T, dom='t'), escape=FALSE)
```
